title: Help~!!! Type Identification
content:
Help!!!   
   
What is the name of this type face, and where can I buy it?   
   
Thank you in advance!   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126054938im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/32842.jpg) ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126054938im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/32843.jpg) ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126054938im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/32844.jpg)

 [‹ SWAT FONT?](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126054938/http:/www.typophile.com/node/4066 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Come and visit, stay for tea - custom font {Jean Y (self)} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126054938/http:/www.typophile.com/node/4117 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content: Aveda uses Lucas de Groots's TheMix.

... and TheSerif. [Here](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126054938/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/)'s where you can purchase a license.   
Top ID Karen!
